title: Is comcast throttling my connection to league of legends during peak hours?
body: every night around this time my ping is 150-260 when it's normally 62 consistently at all other times. what is going on?

replies.body: Hmmmm that might actually be the case here, but let's check and see really quick before jumping to any conclusions. Grab the network logs from that game and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Paste a screenshot of what it gives here so I can go over it with you!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hzW4oE7O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-15T03:35:50.372+0000)
>
> Hmmmm that might actually be the case here, but let's check and see really quick before jumping to any conclusions. Grab the network logs from that game and have our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Paste a screenshot of what it gives here so I can go over it with you!

my speed is fluctuating and my ping was fluctuating they may just be impacted in my area, this is a newly built area and they rarely provide enough infrastructure... let me try to deal with them first and if it continues on this end but nowhere else i'll try that out
